mapper.select: SELECT *, EARTH_DISTANCE(LL_TO_EARTH(LATITUDE, LONGITUDE), LL_TO_EARTH(#{latitude}, #{longitude})) DISTANCE FROM STORE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(ACCOUNT_ID, NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, INFO, PHONE_NUMBER, CAN_RESERVATION, OPERATING_TIME, IS_OPEN) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{name}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{info}, #{phoneNumber}, #{canReservation}, #{operatingTime}, #{isOpen})
